Text: St Croix refinery Cc me to explain about the effect of the refinery fire The St Croix refinery has their reformer offline The reformer is used to convert straightrun naphtha into a high octane blending component called reformate as well as some butane and lighter gases The effect would not really be a reduction in gasoline but a reduction in a high quality blending component which would make it harder to make RFG As of this writing the fire is out If you have any further questions feel free to contact me Jim
